info.+content: Macross Delta is set in the year 2067, 8 years after the events of the latest Macross TV series, Macross Frontier. The story focuses on Walküre, a team of talented idols and the Delta Squadron, a team of experienced Valkyrie pilots as they battle against the Var Syndrome, a mysterious phenomena that is consuming the galaxy and there is also the mysterious Aerial Knights Valkyrie fighter team of the Kingdom of Wind.
#1: "Ichidodake no Koinara" (一度だけの恋なら; If I Love Only Once) by Walküre (eps 2-12, 14)
#2: "Zettai Reido θ Novatick" (絶対零度θノヴァティック; Absolute Zero Novatick) by Walküre (eps 15-25)

#5: "Hametsu no Junjō" (破滅の純情; Ruin of Pure Heart) by Walküre (eps 14-15, 17, 20-21, 23-24)
#8: "Kaze wa Yokoku Naku Fuku" (風は予告なく吹く; The Wind Blows Without Notice) by Walküre (eps 19, 22)

#10: "Zettai Reido θ Novatick" (絶対零度θノヴァティック; Absolute Zero Novatick) by Walküre (ep 26)
"Ai wa Nagareru" (愛は流れる; Love Flows) by Mari Iijima (ep 19)
"Ai, Oboete Imasu ka" (愛・おぼえていますか; Do You Remember Love?) by Mari Iijima (ep 19)

"Axia ~ Daisuki de Daikirai ~" (AXIA〜ダイスキでダイキライ〜; "Axia ~ I Love, I Hate") by Walküre
"Bokura no Senjō" (僕らの戦場; Our Battlefield) by Walküre
"Fukakuteisei☆COSMIC MOVEMENT" (不確定性☆COSMIC MOVEMENT; Uncertainty Cosmic Movement) by Walküre

"Giraffe Blues ~Mikumo Solo~" by Koshimizu Ami (eps 7, 21)

"Lion" (ライオン) by May'n and Megumi Nakajima (ep 19)
"Namidame Bakuhatsuon" (涙目爆発音; Exploding, Teary-Eyed) by Walküre (ep 21)
"Onya no Ko ♡ gir " (おにゃの子♡gir) by Walküre
"Seikan Hikou" (星間飛行; "Interstellar Flight") by Freyja Wion [Minori Suzuki] (ep 23)
